strapiPost.title: 112 Drive-In Announces Season Opening Date
strapiPost.content:
What became the team building event of 2020 and favorite socially distant pastime is returning for the 2022 season.

  • Outdoor movies: This year, the Fayetteville 112 Drive-In season will begin on April 8. As of now, the first movies showing will be License 2 Quill (Sonic the Hedgehog 2) and The Lost City. Though attractions are always subject to change until the Monday before the showing weekend. 
  • How it works: The Drive-In traditionally shown 2 movies a day starting with an early evening family friendly show followed by something for the adults at late night. Admission prices are $10-$5 and children under 5 are free to attend. 

For more information about 112 Drive-In, click HERE.
